welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orosi! This charming town is known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Orosi has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Visalia Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and shops.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Visalia Airport primarily serves regional airlines and offers a more relaxed and quiet atmosphere for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, used for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
